Module.Name: Outdoor air concentrations
Module.Description: Outdoor air concentrations data are analytical measurements of chemical substances occurring in outdoor air samples. In their simplest form, concentration data can just be used as provided by datasets.
Module.ShortDescription: Outdoor air concentrations data are data on analytical measurements of chemical substances occurring in outdoor air samples.
Module.DataDescription: Outdoor air concentrations data can be entered using the internal, relational data format.
